data.title: Casper and the Angels
authors: Contributors to Boomerang Schedule Archive Wiki
data.meta_description: Casper and the Angels is a Hanna-Barbera animated series produced by Hanna-Barbera Productions. In the 22nd century, Casper the Friendly Ghost teams up with a pair of bumbling female Space Patrol cops, Minnie & Maxie, to battle bad guys in outer space.
data.text: Premiere Date Ep No. Name 1 Casper's Golden Chance / Space Circus 2 Casper Ghosts West / Casper's Camp Out 3 Strike Four / The Space Pirate 4 Ship-Wrecked / The Cat Burglar 5 Something Fishy / The Smiling Lisa 6 A Pocket Full O'Schemes / A Tale of Two Trashmen 7 Fatula / T.V. or Not T.V. 8 Gone to the Dogs / Private Eyeball to Eyeball 9 Champ for a Day / The Ghost Robbers 10 Aunt Mary Scarey / The Ice Heist 11 A Shoplifting Experience / The Impossible Scream 12 Prehistoric Hi-Jinx / The Commander Is Missing
